title: US 67 Dallas photos
text:
The $666 million Southern Gateway project, built between 2018 and 2022, modified and expanded the freeway from Interstate 35 to Belt Line Road.

The first series of photos on this page, added in 2022, goes northbound from Camp Wisdom Road to Interstate 35E. The Southern Gateway project modified this section to have six regular lanes and one reversible express lane.

The second series of photos goes southbound south of Belt Line. These photos taken in 2007 are still valid in 2022.

images.caption: Entering US 67 northbound at Camp Wisdom Road.
The toll-free, reversible, barrier-separated express lane starts at South Hampton Road.
The express lane merges into the Interstate 35E express lanes just ahead. For the continuation of the express lanes into downtown, see the Interstate 35E driver's views page.
This view starts the second series of drivers views, which go southbound south of Belt Line Road. To see the drivers views north of this point, see the US 67 driver's views archive
At the Gilco Road/Dove Lane exit
In Midlothian, with US 287 visible ahead. The US 67 freeway ends just past US 287 with a signalized intersection.
